subject: Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
Cruelty to Animals
lead_paragraph: The decision to bar Sapphire during the World Cup stung her rider, McLain Ward, who has spent much of his career trying to escape the shadow of his family’s past.
snippet: The decision to bar Sapphire during the World Cup stung her rider, McLain Ward, who has spent much of his career trying to escape the shadow of his family’s past.
